thread.title: N.C. native Bam Adebayo makes bold prediction for Duke-UNC
thread.title_full: N.C. native Bam Adebayo makes bold prediction for Duke-UNC

title: N.C. native Bam Adebayo makes bold prediction for Duke-UNC
text:
N.C. native Bam Adebayo makes bold prediction for Duke-UNC North Carolina native and Kentucky freshman Bam Adebayo made a bold prediction for tonight's Duke-UNC rivalry game. Slot to Kentucky Links 
Growing up in Little Washington, N.C., Kentucky freshman forward Bam Adebayo is more than familiar with the Duke-North Carolina rivalry. 
The North Carolina native, who chose the Wildcats over UNC and N.C. State among others, offered a bold prediction for tonight's game: 
Get the latest UK news sent straight to your inbox with out EMAIL NEWSLETTER â€” Bam Adebayoâ„¢ðŸŒ¹ (@Bam1of1) February 9, 2017 
The all-time series between the Blue Devils and Tar Heels is about as close as it gets, with each team recording 48 wins and scoring 7,437 points apiece. 
No. 7 North Carolina and No. 19 Duke tip off at 8 PM on ESPN. 
The Wildcats (19-5, 9-2 SEC) defeated the Tar Heels 103-100 at the CBS Sports Classic in Las Vegas in December. Author
